channel.title: events on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service
channel.description: Recent content in events on CDS - Continuous Delivery Service

item.title: listen
item.description: cdsctl events listen Listen CDS events Synopsis Listen CDS events cdsctl events listen [flags] Options --project string project key to listen --workflow string workflow name to listen Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -n, --no-interactive Set to disable interaction with ctl --verbose Enable verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl events - Listen CDS Events
